title: Epic: Data Tools
description:
Implement data connectors for BigQuery and Meta API.

## Data Source Strategy
- DEMO: Meta API (live)
- DEV/TEST: BigQuery (pre-loaded)
- FALLBACK: BigQuery (if Meta fails)

## BigQuery Data
- TL: 298 days history
- WH: 76 days history
- Fields: spend, ROAS, impressions, clicks, CTR, CPC, CPM, ad_name, ad_provider, store

comments.author: recovery-sync
comments.text: Closed by recovery sync: Epic complete - Data tools (BQ + fixtures) done
